long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A smart cross store cart to provide assistant of online shoppings. 
It is to help customers to 
1) Get the prices from other stores, and
2) Understand the product features and reviews through ChatGPT, and 
3) providing a virtual cart to trace the price change of multiple stores.
